#summary Using Lisp based client

= Introduction =

This is a set of example lisp programs to show how access can be simplified through a number of Lisp based functions. 

  * LSharpConsole application
  * balance.lisp
  * DCMP.lisp

= Details =

Download a ZIP archive with all necessary files : [http://robobuildervc.googlecode.com/files/Lsharp%20with%20RobobuilderLib.zip RobobuilderLib.zip]

There is an online PDF tutorial to explain how to use LISP/L# to interface [http://robobuildervc.googlecode.com/files/PDFOnline.pdf PDF file]

On start up the console will load boot.lisp. Example Session - from a cmd prompt
